body: All of the variants modified here are really expensive to turn on and not required for many builds, so I think it improves the user experience of spack overall to turn them off by default. Apologies to those who assume the current defaults in their workflows and a reminder that the new concretizer makes it easier for packages to explicitly depend on e.g. `mesa+llvm`.
title: mesa, mesa18: Change defaults on llvm variant in order to get leaner builds
